title: ChartSeries
description: Configuration for a data series within a chart component, specifying data source, visualization type, colors, and legend properties. Defines how data is visualized in charts.

type.description: Visualization type for this data series.

dataField.description: Field name from the bound data source representing the numeric/value axis of this series (e.g., 'revenue', 'count'). For formal data-model binding, use a relationship to the corresponding data-model entity.

categoryField.description: Field name from the bound data source representing the category/x-axis grouping (e.g., 'month', 'region'). For formal data-model binding, use a relationship to the corresponding data-model entity.

color.description: CSS color value for this series (e.g., '#3B82F6', 'var(--brand-primary)'). Overrides any theme-level color scheme for this specific series.

lineStyle.description: CSS border/line style applied to line chart series rendering, per CSS Border specification.
